overview: Mark Flaherty heads up all marketing activities at InetSoft including awareness building, lead generation, event and PR marketing. Mr. Flaherty’s most recent experience was as a product marketing director at Virgin Mobile USA, and earlier roles there included building the mobile carrier’s performance management function from the ground up and then helping the company evolve to a world-class implementation of business intelligence software. Previously Mr. Flaherty headed up marketing for another enterprise software company, ThinAirApps, which was acquired by Palm, Inc. Mr. Flaherty’s educational background includes an MBA from the Fuqua School of Business (Duke University) and a BA from Princeton University.
